comment.author: 68620296@N07
comment._content: Peter C. Hiebert (1878-1963) was the first chairman of the MCC Executive Committee, serving from its founding in 1920 to 1953. C. N. (Christian Neff) Hostetter, Jr., Messiah College President, was the second chairman, serving from 1953 to 1967. Orie Miller was executive secretary-treasurer from 1935 to 1958, when he was succeeded by William T. Snyder.

comment.author: 68620296@N07
comment._content: Robert Kreider identified the man between C. N. Hostetter and H. A. Fast as Waldo Hiebert of Hillsboro, Kan., and later Fresno, Calif.
